name: Smile&Weave
description:
You are at a mouse knitting convention, but there is a cat going around bullying everyone. You need to spread happiness and overcome the bully by waving, hugging, giving gifts, and punching at the convention!

Have fun in this first person hugger!

Developed in Unreal in 2 Weeks by: Dylan, Jimmy, Chengxi, Levi, Kyra
